name: manifest-viewer
title: Manifest Viewer
description: View and navigate HLS/DASH manifest files with keyboard navigation to child variant playlists
author: stonko1994

commands.name: view-manifest
commands.title: View Manifest
commands.description: Load and navigate manifest files (HLS/DASH) with keyboard navigation to child variants

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
